description: CATDagger - An automatic differential gain catalog tagger

parameters.info: Residual / noise FITS map to use for estimating local RMS
parameters.name: noise-map

parameters.info: Stokes to consider when computing global noise estimates. Ideally this should be 'V', if available
parameters.name: stokes

parameters.info: Minimum number of tiles per region. Regions with fewer tiles will not be tagged as dE
parameters.name: min-tiles-region

parameters.info: SAODS9 regions filename to write out
parameters.name: ds9-reg-file

parameters.info: SAODS9 regions filename to contain tagged cluster leads as circles
parameters.name: ds9-tag-reg-file

parameters.info: Threshold to use in detecting outlier regions
parameters.name: sigma

parameters.info: Number of pixels per region tile axis
parameters.name: tile-size

parameters.info: Percentile tiles to consider for global rms calculations
parameters.name: global-rms-percentile

parameters.info: Tag name to use for tagged sources in tigger LSM
parameters.name: de-tag-name

parameters.info: Cutoff distance from phase centre in which no tags be raised. This can be used to effectively exclude the FWHM of an parabolic reflector-based interferometer.
parameters.name: min-distance-from-tracking-centre

parameters.info: Add manual exclusion zone to which no dE tags shall be added. Expects a tripple of centre X, Y pixel and radius.
parameters.name: add-custom-exclusion-zone

parameters.info: The maximum tolerance for right skewness of a pixel distribution within a region.A large value (tailed distribution) indicates significant uncleaned flux remaining in the residual. This can be used to effectively control detection sensitivity to uncleaned extended emission, but should be set to 0 if residuals other than stokes I are used
parameters.name: max-region-right-skewness

parameters.info: PSF image from which BPA, BMAJ and BMIN may be extracted
parameters.name: psf-image

parameters.info: Tigger LSM to recluster and tag. If this is not specified only DS9 regions will be written out
parameters.name: input-lsm

parameters.info: Blank out model images within resolution of tagged LSM components. Expects list of model FITS files. This option is useful for hybrid DFT-CLEAN component modelling as onlyextended / faint clean components contributes to model.
parameters.name: remove-tagged-dE-components-from-model-images

parameters.info: Only store dE tagged sources in lsm. This option is useful for hybrid DFT-CLEAN component modelling, as only bright compact gaussian emission contributes to dE solutions
parameters.name: only-dEs-in-lsm

parameters.info: The maximum tolerance for the ratio of positive to negative flux. Only to be used with stokes I
parameters.name: max-positive-to-negative-flux

parameters.info: The maximum tolerance for absolute skewness of a pixel distribution within a region.A large value (tailed distribution) indicates significant uncleaned flux remaining in the residual. This can be used to effectively control detection sensitivity to uncleaned extended emission, but should be set to 0 if residuals other than stokes Q,U or V are used
parameters.name: max-region-abs-skewness
